description: Starts the connection required for Outpost server installation. Use CloudTrail to monitor this action or Amazon Web Services managed policy for Amazon Web Services Outposts to secure it. For more information, see Amazon Web Services managed policies for Amazon Web Services Outposts and Logging Amazon Web Services Outposts API calls with Amazon Web Services CloudTrail in the Amazon Web Services Outposts User Guide.

parameters.name: AssetId
parameters.description: The ID of the Outpost server.

parameters.name: ClientPublicKey
parameters.description: The public key of the client.

parameters.name: NetworkInterfaceDeviceIndex
parameters.description: The device index of the network interface on the Outpost server.
